dcterms:creator: M. Jun
et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing CT scans of COVID-19 patients with annotated lung and infection segmentation masks, used for training and evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 CT Lung and Infection Segmentation Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Ma
et al.
dcterms:description: Reference segmentation masks provided for COVID-19 CT images, used as a benchmark for evaluating segmentation performance.
dcterms:title: Reference segmentation provided by Ma et al.
